resources.title: Torres del Paine
resources.description: A stunning national park known for its soaring mountains, bright blue icebergs, and golden pampas filled with wildlife.

resources.title: Atacama Desert
resources.description: The driest desert in the world, home to breathtaking salt flats, hot springs, and otherworldly landscapes.

resources.title: Easter Island
resources.description: A remote volcanic island famed for its mysterious moai statues created by the early Rapa Nui people.

resources.title: Puerto Varas
resources.description: A charming town on the shores of Lake Llanquihue with stunning views of the Osorno and Calbuco volcanoes.
